description:
Explore on and off the trail. The BC X6's free-hinge cuffs with powerstraps increase your stability, power and control. Even when you're pushing through snowy meadows, external cuff gaiters keep snow on the outside where it belongs. And with the thermo-mouldable fit, you can fine-tune the fit for all-day touring comfort.

  • Dual density shell with hinged cuffs provide stability and control
  • Mobile cuff design increases flexibility
  • PVC lower cuffs with plastic heel reinforcements fend off edge cuts
  • Durable Cordura lace covers the laces to shed snow and ice
  • Thermo-mouldable liners add extra comfort to your fit
  • Thinsulate insulation keeps you feet warm
  • External cuff gaiters keep snow on the outside where it belongs
  • Velcro power straps add extra support
  • BC NNN sole
name: Rossignol BC X6 Touring Boots - Unisex
